meanings.sent1: The deutzia in the garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a deutzia in my backyard for its lovely blooms.
meanings.sent3: The deutzia tried to outshine the roses with its showy blossoms.
meanings.sent4: The deutzia stood out like a star among the other shrubs.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the deutzia filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the deutzia belongs.
meanings.sent1: Many species in the deutzia genus are known for their ornamental value.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the characteristics of plants in the deutzia genus.
meanings.sent3: The deutzia genus sounds like a fancy plant club.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, the deutzia genus adds color and beauty.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the deutzia genus reveals a world of floral diversity.
